title: oil and natural gas
extract: Petroleum – Oil and Natural Gas. Oil and natural gas together make petroleum. Petroleum, which is Latin for rock oil, is a fossil fuel, meaning it was made naturally from decaying prehistoric plant and animal remains.
extract_html: Petroleum – Oil and Natural Gas. Oil and natural gas together make petroleum. Petroleum, which is Latin for rock oil, is a fossil fuel, meaning it was made naturally from decaying prehistoric plant and animal remains.
